positions.name: position1
positions.title: What Covers You
positions.meaning: The central issue or where you are presently with the situation.

positions.name: position2
positions.title: What Crosses You
positions.meaning: A crosswind or opposing factor to the situation

positions.name: position3
positions.title: What is Beneath You
positions.meaning: The foundation or basis upon which the present situation is grounded. Unconscious influences.

positions.name: position4
positions.title: What is Behind You
positions.meaning: The past events immediately preceding and leading up to the situation, which are receding in influence

positions.name: position5
positions.title: What Crowns You and Could Come into Being
positions.meaning: Your conscious thoughts on the situation or what hover over as a potential

positions.name: position6
positions.title: What is Before You
positions.meaning: The near future, what is soon to manifest. Unresolved issue you will have to face.

positions.name: position7
positions.title: Your Attitude to the Situation
positions.meaning: Where you are at presently regarding the question asked. Self-image. Inner resource to tap.

positions.name: position8
positions.title: Your House
positions.meaning: Your environment or those you live with

positions.name: position9
positions.title: Hopes and Fears
positions.meaning: Your greatest hope and/or worst fear. Guidance regarding the question. Key factor.

positions.name: position10
positions.title: The Outcome
positions.meaning: The final outcome in terms of inner self, outer circumstances, or how it affects those around you.
